unnormalised: Okay, koni tori Bharotant daan korchea vishayant ulo marlo, sori? Ami rupiyanche vishayent uloiom-ia. Mandirantlim daan pettiyam tumkam distat? Thodim legit asat, thodim...thodi legit nasnat. Koslench divchea poilim, khas korun poixe divchea poilim, sod korat.
normalised: Borem, konnem tori Bharotant dan korchea vixim vicharle, haina? Rupea vixim uloiam. Mandirantlea danachea pettika tumi pollaita? Kaim niyall astaat, kaim… itle nhoi. Kaim diunche adim sod laun pollod, khas korun rokkh diunche adim.

unnormalised: Atam, tumi kar-dhondhe vaddovpache sodtat zalear, tem ek veglem khel. Income Tax Actachea Section 80G khal nondni kelelea trustank ani sanghatnank dilelea daanank lagun tumkam thodi suvat mellonk xokta. Punn tumchea kodden receipt asonk zai, okay? Ani registration number. Number na zalear, kar faido na. Itlench sopem.
normalised: Atam, tumi cor remission sodtat zalear, tem ek vegllench khel asa. Income Tax Actache Section eighty G hachea adharant nondni kel’lea trust ani organizationsan dan dilear tumkam thodi suvath mellttoli. Punn tumche kodde receipt asunk zai, barem? Ani nondni number. Number na zalear, coracho labh na. Titlem sovem.

unnormalised: Thoddim sanghatnanam bhair asat. CRY (Child Rights and You), Goonj, Helpage India...yaad zait vaddoita. Thodi sod korat, eka koslea tori karya khatir tumkam khoreponnim lagta tem sodat. Konnem tori WhatsApp-acher message forward kel'lean fattim lagun diunk zai nam.
normalised: Thoddim organizationa thaim asat. C-R-Y (Child Rights and You), Goonj, Helpage India…hi yadi ankutt asa. Thodem khondhat hadd, ek soddun kadd zachem kam tumkam khorench manavta. Konnem tori WhatsApp-acher message forward kelo mhunn dekhun thoddem diunaka.

unnormalised: Ani, poixe-i bhairuch dharunuch asat. Tumchea kodden junim kapdde asunk xaktat tumi atam vaporonam? Goonj tachea khatir boro asa. Vo tumi tumcho vell volunteer korunk xaktat? Khup NGO-k sodankall modot karanchi zait garaz asta. Khas korun Diwali vellar, tankam zait modotichi garaz asta.
normalised: Tech bhaxen, fokot poixeanchi chintna korinaka. Tumchen kodde purani kapdde asat tumi atam vaprinant? Goonj tachya khatir borem asa. Ya tumi tumcho vell volunteer korunk xakta? Zaite N-G-O sodtan tim madat korunk lokank. Diwali vellar timka zaite madatichi goroz asta.

unnormalised: Poixe vishayent ulo marlear, sodankall vhoddlem daan korop nashta. Thodde poixe-i fark vaddonk xaktat. Rs. 100, Rs. 500...dor ek thodde lekhek lagta. Tem tumchi dissachi chaye dhorun dhorun eka satolle khatir daan korun disunk zai. Thoddi sacrifice, vhoddlem prabhav.
normalised: Poixeanchi uloup kortanam, tenha zaite diunchek aslachem nhoi. Thoddem diunchench sudha farkh dita. Rupia ekxem, Rupia panchxem… dar ek bit mellun zata. Dusrea cheak soddun divop ani te poixe dan diop. Thodem sacrifice, vhodd prabav.

unnormalised: Atam, mhaka khup lok poixe divpak bhieeta mhunn mhaka khobor asa kerann tankam te kuthe zat mhunn khobor nam. Tem ek legit chinta asa. Je sanghatnanam tankachea poixe vishayent transparent asat tem sodat. Tankam tankanchea varsache reports online mellonk zai. Tankam asli programs khatir kitle poixe zata ani kitle administrative costs khatir zata tem pollyat.
normalised: Atam, hanv zannam zaite lok poixe diunk ghabrata, kiteak tanka khobor nasta te kothim zatai mhunn. Tem ek niyall chinta asa. Organizatin pollod je transparent asat tanchea finance vixim. Tankam aplo annual report online uplabdh asunk zai. Poodd kitle poixe vostavichea programak vetat ani kitle administrative costak vetat.

unnormalised: Sokonnim, tumi kityak daan kartat tem ugddas dovrat. Tem kar faido vo tumkam borech distat mhunn nashta. Tem gorjevont lokank modot korchea vishayant asa. Tem goribi ani asomanatak ek thodi dent marchea vishayant asa. Ani tem koslea tori poixe-i bhairuch molachem asa, bhai. Tari, ek karan tumi biswas dhoratat tem sodat, tumchem homework korat, ani dillit daan karat (punn bud'dhin!). Dhaktinuch 200 rupiya mahinyak aslearuch. Dor ek thodi modot karta.
normalised: Nimanne, yaad dovrat tumi kiteak dan kortat. Tem fokot tax remission aslachen nhoi ya barem dista te aslachen nhoi. Goroz astaleank madat korop mhunn. Tondri ani samanata sodunk. Ani tem kitlech poixeani sudha zata, bhai. Mhunn dekhun, ek karan sodhun kadd jim tumkam mann’ta, tumcho ghorkaam kor ani dan di daryani (punn husharponnan!). Thoddech Rupia donxem disache asthele tori sudha. Dar ek thodi madat zata.
